comment:
Nose - Leather, shoe polish, solvent, red fruit, ethanol
Palate - Sweet, solvent, shoe polish
Finish - Medium, tannic
43% ABV
Smokey and Petey. Deep, rich smell and long breathe

At 46%abv and 25.00US it's not bad, but it's not great. It has an old funk about it. Not spoiled or rotten. Ever had a box of old sunmaid raisins? That's what I'm getting on the nose and the palette is the same with a bitter finish. Perhaps they used some worn out  cask that are imparting this strong flavor.
A bit sweeter than the blended.  Not a ton of flavor.  Something for non scotch drinkers.

Nose: hint of vanilla and wood
Tongue: sharp, woody
Finish: Strong and lingering
Great value for money!
